states: Dadra and Nagar Haveli and Daman and Diu

recommendations.title: National Predictive Camps
recommendations.description: Deploy permanent centers in high-growth clusters identified via nationwide Z-score analysis.

recommendations.title: Digital Self-Service Update
recommendations.description: Incentivize AI-driven document verification for demographic updates to reduce center footfall.

recommendations.title: Mandatory Renewal Tracker
recommendations.description: Implement appointment-based notifications for the 5-17 and 17+ biometric renewal cycles.
